welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Paris, the City of Lights! Get ready to be enchanted by the Eiffel Tower, indulge in delicious French cuisine, and immerse yourself in the city's rich culture. We invite you to explore and savor all that Paris has to offer."

terminals.description: This is the main terminal at Cox Field Airport, serving domestic and international flights.
